name: Root Quest: A Journey For Life
name_original: Root Quest: A Journey For Life
description:
A-D keys or Left-Right arrows to start game and rotate
Space to restart on game over
Esc to quit

Da Ros Alice: artist (1st time jammer) Guida Francesco: programmer, jolly Melfi Davide: programmer (1st time game developing) Villa Lorenzo: programmer (1st time unity developing)

Designed by the whole team

Special mention to: Aquino Giorgio
